title: Average age of customers opting to buy Rolls-Royce cars is mid-40s: Official
description: HNIs in their mid-40s are among the majority when it comes to buying Rolls-Royce's cars in India. Rolls-Royce Motor Cars has launched its latest all-electric model, the Spectre, in India, with a starting price of Rs 7.5 crore (about $1 million). The luxury automaker aims to tap into the growing demand for high-end electric vehicles (EVs) in the Indian market.
